name: CodeSpells
description: Craft any magical spell you can imagine using the most powerful tool there is: code. CodeSpells is currently an unguided, sandbox experience for the bravest wizards who want to help the developers steer the game's development.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Greater Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Greater Processor: 3 GHZ Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
